website_summaries.verdict: The Under Armour Velociti is a neutral running shoe based on a minimalist design that enables the natural gait of runners. It’s a solid option for those who want to make quick and smooth transitions through the gait cycle. The shoe’s upper, being nicely flexible, adapts very well to the changing movements and wraps itself securely around the runner’s foot.
pros: Many runners highly appreciated the light weight of the shoe
Most wearers appreciated the minimalist design because it encouraged natural movements of the foot during running
The customers thought the pair was optimally comfortable
The runners mentioned how incredibly responsive the shoe’s midsole was
one such individual felt the shoe bouncing back and propelling him forward as he sprinted
The purchasers liked the lace-up closure of the Under Armour Velociti since it secured their feet firmly, thereby ensuring a snug fit
A few fashion-lovers admired the overall design of the shoe
A runner found the ‘recording function’ of the shoe very convenient since it kept track of her miles run in a day
cons: A few runners thought that this running shoe did not provide adequate support for longer distances

customer_reviews.title: Maybe Under Armour shoes run a tad small, maybe it's just my bozo feet.
customer_reviews.text: I like these, unfortunately I have a pair of bozo the clown feet. I wear between a 10 and 11 in women's. I ordered 10 cuz Nike 10's fit me, but these were just too snug. But they are very lightweight, the bottom of the shoe is so flexible and bendy, they feel and look like you can take flight in them. It hurt me to return them because I wanted to just stuff my foot in and go for a run. I plan on reordering a size 10.5 or 11 because they are exactly what I'm looking for, and I can tell they're good running shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Raylie Top Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Order a half size up
customer_reviews.text: These are a great looking shoe, comfortable, and lightweight. However, I highly recommend ordering a half size up. I have owned two other under armour shoes and they were true to size. After putting on about 60 miles on these between running and walking, they have broken in but still just a tad snug.
customer_reviews.author: spry_llama

customer_reviews.title: The shoe would be fine if they could fix the heel
customer_reviews.text: The shoe would be fine if they could fix the heel. Ive never gotten blisters from any pair of shoes or cleats i've ever worn. These were the first. The heel is extremely hard and can dig into your achilles/heel region. Back to Nikes.
customer_reviews.author: Keith

customer_reviews.title: Shoe runs small
customer_reviews.text: Really like the look of it. It is very light and looks great. However, be careful this shoe runs small. I saw in the size chart, US 7.5 is 25.5 cm, US 7 is 25 cm. Without information on US 6.5 cm and I assumed is will be 24.5 cm. Unfortunately, US 6.5 of this shoe is 23.5 cm. Have to return as it is too small and tight.
customer_reviews.author: Lidan

customer_reviews.title: Shoes are comfortable & good looking
customer_reviews.text: I got these shoes for my boyfriend & he loves them. He has a narrow foot but these shoes fit perfectly, are very comfortable & good looking.
customer_reviews.author: E. Yox

customer_reviews.title: I bought a 1/2 size larger and it fits great. Been testing them out on the treadmill and ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought a 1/2 size larger and it fits great. Been testing them out on the treadmill and so far so good. I don't even wear socks and they feel fine.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony D. Glover

customer_reviews.title: I really like these shoes
customer_reviews.text: I really like these shoes! They have good support and help with my plantar fasciitis. However they do run somewhat small compared to most of the other Under Armour shoes I have bought in the past. Definitely worth the price though.
customer_reviews.author: Delaney Revels

customer_reviews.title: Only pair of UA that's fit like this. All others I own fit perfect
customer_reviews.text: Fit small. Only pair of UA that's fit like this. All others I own fit perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Guido

customer_reviews.title: Nice fit but got a blister first use
customer_reviews.text: Good fit but go easy with them at the beginning... had huge blister on back of foot on first use.
customer_reviews.author: Wen V.

customer_reviews.title: 9.5 are 8.5 size dont fit
customer_reviews.text: I normally wear a size 9.5 but with these shoes a 9.5 is more like a 8.5. Sadly, I had to return them since I'm not going to wear shoes a full size smaller than advertised and walk around with my toes bent. They were off by a full inch from true size.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great looking shoes - I love anything 'Under Armour"
customer_reviews.text: Great looking shoes - I love anything 'Under Armour". But I am sad to say that they are a bit too roomy for my foot. I am consistently a size 6, so it's highly unusual that a size 6 does not fit properly. So - maybe order half size smaller than normal.
customer_reviews.author: liz lowry

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable, very good to use during my indoor workouts; good fit on heal of foot; although somewhat large around toes, my foot does not slide inside the shoe. I would recommend these for workouts
customer_reviews.author: Magnolia01

customer_reviews.title: Nice pair of sneakers but they run too small compared ...
customer_reviews.text: Nice pair of sneakers but they run too small compared to other under armour shoes. I think these were made in China.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: Had to break in, but after they are comfortable and stylish. Plus good deal, got on sale for $47 :D As: 6
customer_reviews.author: Lynda

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Would have given it a 5-star but the toe box pinches a bit.
customer_reviews.author: J. Vasquez

customer_reviews.title: great shoe
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my daughter and she loves them! She say they are comfortable, breathable and light!
customer_reviews.author: Brandi STop Contributor: Makeup

customer_reviews.title: Nice, but poor quality control.
customer_reviews.text: Poor quality control. Package was fine, but inside box 1 sneaker was filthy. Amazon issued full refund.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Alan Weed

customer_reviews.title: Runs small
customer_reviews.text: I got these in size 8 and returned getting a size 8.5 and they are too small. Will need to get a size 9. Love the color
customer_reviews.author: carolyn black

customer_reviews.title: Color
customer_reviews.text: They weren't as orange as I thought they were going to be more of a bright salmon colored
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany Mericle

customer_reviews.title: Too small
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to sell 7,5- 42( europe size) . But it was too small. Like women size
customer_reviews.author: Özlem Turabi

customer_reviews.title: Everything was perfect
customer_reviews.text: I was very pleased with my under armor running shoes
customer_reviews.author: james

customer_reviews.title: I don't have the box and I would like to return
customer_reviews.text: Just one week of use and got a hole in the front. I don't have the box and I would like to return.
customer_reviews.author: Ligia Paula Soares

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Was skeptical at 1st ,absolutley love the color's as blue is my favorite. They looked thin and cheap but I gave it a shot and I am so glad I did. These shoes are some of best and most comfortable shoe's I own. I have alot of shoes some are over 125.00 and these are more comfortable. I wear a size 12 and alot of people said these are to small etc.. I have to tell you these fit perfect plus my right shoe. I have a insole I have to wear.I highly recommend these shoes and Definitly will wear and buy more of this style. Thank's
customer_reviews.author: Greg

customer_reviews.title: Wrong sizing
customer_reviews.text: It shows the shoes are listed in a men’s size. However, when I got the shoes, they’re actually in a women’s size. I really like the color of the shoes, I just wish they would have came in a men’s size as displayed.
customer_reviews.author: Stevie

product_meta.title: Under Armour Men's Speedform Velociti Running Shoes
product_meta.description: RUNNING STYLE: Focused on speed, this shoe delivers a super lightweight feel & a bouncy cushioning system .Innovative UA SpeedForm construction molds to the foot for a precision fit, eliminating all distraction .Engineered mesh delivers a light, comfortable fit & amazing breathability .Internal heel counter provides seamless, lightweight support & structure .Embedded sockliner for added cushioning & seamless comfort .Charged Cushioning midsole uses compressed foam for even greater responsiveness & durability, providing optimal cushioning & energy return .Blown rubber under the forefoot is lightweight yet incredibly responsive .High-abrasion rubber placed under the heel to help absorb ground contact .Offset: 8 mm .
feature_bullets: NEUTRAL: For runners who need a balance of flexibility & cushioning
Innovative UA SpeedForm construction molds to the foot for a precision fit, eliminating all distraction
Engineered mesh delivers a light, comfortable fit & amazing breathability
Internal heel counter provides seamless, lightweight support & structure
Embedded sockliner for added cushioning & seamless comfort
